string.name: name
string.value: Secret Love Affair with Seal Meat
#b#p2071007##k says she has a special favor to ask. I should go to #b#m222000000##k.

#b#p2071007##k says she used to love eating #t04000166#. 
Even #b#p2071007##k's husband knows how much she loves #t04000166# and would occasionally buy it for her. The problem is that since recently, #b#p2071007##k says she's been liking #b#t04000157##k more. I should help out #b#p2071007##k, who always has to get #b#t04000157##k secretly her husband's back.

#i04000157##t04000157# #b#c04000157#/15
#b#p2071007##k laughed with such excitement. It felt good to know that my efforts were not in vain.

I'm so hungry... I would love to be able to have some #b#t04000157##k... Do you think you can help me and get me some #b#t04000157##k? I wouldn't usually ask for favors like this, but I haven't had any in such a long time.

My husband gets me #b#t04000166##k once in awhile. When I was younger, I liked it more, but for some reason now #b#t04000157##k tastes so much better. I usually have some #b#t04000157##k hidden away... but now I'm all out.

I can't ask my husband because I would feel bad, so I was hoping you could get me some #b#t04000157##k. #r#o4230124##k is stronger than it looks so I'm not sure if you'll be able to handle it... Do you think you can?
It's okay~ I shouldn't have asked you for such a difficult favor. It's just that I haven't had #b#t04000157##k in so long. Have a nice day~
Hey there youngster, over here~ Were you able to successfully catch a #r#o4230124##k?

Thank you~ Thank you~ What would I have done without you? Yes, yes... This one looks very plump. Now I'll be able to secretly eat #b#t04000157##k again without my husband knowing. How could I thank you enough... Hehe.
It's okay~ I can always wait so don't worry about it~
